title: Update PATIL Construction site logo to latest 3D mockup (new-7)

requirements.summary: Generate a new square transparent PNG logo (512x512) tightly cropped from the latest uploaded PATIL Construction 3D logo wall mockup (new-7).
acceptanceCriteria: A new transparent PNG logo asset exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/patil-logo-3d-new7.dim_512x512.png with dimensions 512x512.
The exported logo is tightly cropped to the logo mark with no visible wall/mockup background.

file_operations.description: Create the transparent 512x512 PNG logo derived from the source image (patil construction 3d jpeg new-7.jpg): remove wall/background and tightly crop to the logo mark, then place it at this exact path to be served as a static asset.

requirements.summary: Replace header and footer logo references to use the newly generated patil-logo-3d-new7 asset while preserving current sizing behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: Logo remains visually balanced and not clipped across mobile and desktop breakpoints (current sizing behavior preserved: h-12 w-auto object-contain).

file_operations.description: Update the header logo src to use /assets/generated/patil-logo-3d-new7.dim_512x512.png instead of /assets/generated/patil-logo-3d-new5.dim_512x512.png, keeping existing classes (h-12 w-auto object-contain) and layout unchanged.

Update the footer logo src to use /assets/generated/patil-logo-3d-new7.dim_512x512.png instead of /assets/generated/patil-logo-3d-new5.dim_512x512.png, keeping existing classes (h-12 w-auto object-contain) and layout unchanged.
